          <title>
            <string language="en">Neutralisation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neutralisation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Neutralisation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neutralização</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Neutralizzazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ουδετεροποίηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Neutralización</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show the reaction between an acidic and alkaline solution resulting in the formation of water molecules.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acidic solutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acids</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen die Reaktion zwischen 
einer säurehaltigen und alkalischen Lösung resultierend in der 
Anordnung der Wassermoleküle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent la réaction entre une
solution acide et alkaline ayant pour résultat la formation des 
molécules d'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram a reação entre uma 
solução acidic e alcalina tendo por resultado a formação de 
moléculas de água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano la reazione fra una
soluzione silicea ed alcalina con conseguente formazione delle 
molecole di acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν την αντίδραση μεταξύ
μιας όξινης και αλκαλικής λύσης με συνέπεια το σχηματισμό των 
μορίων ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran la reacción entre 
una solución ácida y alcalina dando por resultado la formación de 
las moléculas de agua.</string>
          </description>
